newsitem.title: JAPAN: TOCOM raises September rubber futures margin fees.
newsitem.headline: TOCOM raises September rubber futures margin fees.

text.p: The Tokyo Commodity Exchange (TOCOM) said on Wednesday that it would raise the margin requirements on its September rubber futures contract by 40,000 yen per trading lot, effective from Thursday.
This will bring the September margin requirement to 102,500 yen, TOCOM said in a statement.
The move is intended to cool overheated trade.
The margin requirement on the spot August contract will be unchanged at 157,750 yen, while fees on other rubber contracts will remain unchanged at 52,500 yen, TOCOM said.
